definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Retain the most memorable kiss, kissing the man failed to keep.
sentences.chinese: 留住了最刻骨铭心的吻，留不住接吻的那个人。

sentences.english: The lovers kissed and cuddled on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 在沙发上又是接吻又是搂抱。

sentences.english: Kissing sounds, howling, and smacking lips.
sentences.chinese: 接吻声，仿狼嚎，吧哒嘴唇。

sentences.english: They had several dates that went no further than a good-night kiss.
sentences.chinese: 他们有许多约会，最多不超过一晚安接吻。

sentences.english: Let's be honest, the lip-sucking kiss is the best.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，吸吮式的接吻是最棒的。

sentences.english: The average person spends two weeks of their life kissing.
sentences.chinese: 平均每个人要花费两周时间来学会接吻。

sentences.english: This song of mine will touch your forehead like a kiss of blessing.
sentences.chinese: 我这一只歌将触着你的前额，好像那祝福的接吻一样。

sentences.english: Wit the blue sky and blue sea kissing in your sight.
sentences.chinese: 视线里延伸着蓝色的水天接吻。

sentences.english: I thought your mouth when I saw someone were mouth-to-mouth.
sentences.chinese: 当我看到别人接吻时，我想起了你的嘴。

sentences.english: When it comes to the physiology of kissing we are on slightly firmer ground.
sentences.chinese: 当涉及到接吻的生理时，我们却有着稍微坚实的基础。

sentences.english: Well, people close their eyes when kissing.
sentences.chinese: 人们在接吻时闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: The world has kissed my soul with its pain. inquiring for its return in songs.
sentences.chinese: 世界以它的痛苦同我接吻，而央浼歌声做报酬。

sentences.english: You're probably doing different things, like kissing, fondling, licking, etc…
sentences.chinese: 你们也许是不同的事情，比如接吻，爱抚，舔，等等。

sentences.english: Kissing is a tradition if two people stand under mistletoe hung in a doorway.
sentences.chinese: 接吻是一个传统如果两个人在门口挂下站在槲寄生上。

sentences.english: Idleness, like kisses, to be sweet must be stolen.
sentences.chinese: 悠闲好比接吻，一定要偷来的才香。

definition: to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
